Posts.Content: Apr 4, 2014 11:28PM ginafish wrote: yes, it was found in lymph nodes too. But my doctor said I would be a good candidate for either a lumpectomy or mastectomy. I have lots of homework to do this weekend before seeing him on Monday. thanks for all the support!
Posts.Title: was Mirena responsible for my lump ginafish Srh242

Posts.Content: ginafish wrote: I just had my biopsy done today on one lump and two lymph nodes. I had my annual in November and no lumps were felt. Had Mirena put in in December and noticed a good size lump 2 weeks ago. Doctors say it looks very suspicious and are already treating me as if it's cancer. I can't help but wonder if the Mirena is responsible. Nothing is confirmed yet, but not looking good. I am 38 years old. Anyone have any thoughts on mirena and breast cancer?? Dx 4/4/2014, IDC, 1cm, Stage IIA, Grade 3, 2/18 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Surgery 4/28/2014 Lumpectomy: Right; Lymph node removal: Right, Underarm/Axillary Chemotherapy 6/17/2014 AC Radiation Therapy Breast Log in to post a reply
